section.title: Original Authors
section.p: I am rather oblivious about the history of the driver before the 7.2 release and who should be credited for it. As far as I can tell it was originally developed by Peter Mount and Adrian Hall. If you know better please let us know.

section.title: Contributors
section.p: People who have contributed significant code to the project. These are just those I could recall from the past year without an endless poring over old emails and commit messages. If you've been forgetten, don't hesitate to let us know about it.
